synopsis.text: Marimo Nogami, a soft-spoken and gentle fourth-grader, leads a peaceful life amidst her school friends. However, beneath her tranquil demeanor lies a formidable strength that awakens when her friends are threatened by local troublemakers. Despite her aversion to conflict, Marimo transforms into an almost invincible fighter, fueled by her unwavering kindness and deep-seated desire to protect those she cares about. This heartwarming tale follows Marimo's journey as she navigates the challenges of elementary school life while standing up against bullies, revealing her hidden power and resilience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
